nodes.text: Zag Tefilous was a male professional speeder racer.

Zag was born in a family of vagabonds and thrill seekers and left his homeworld along with his sister Patra at a young age to race in the amateur circuits. His natural skills soon attracted the attention of XySpeeder Corporation, and Zag gained his first sponsor. He then went on to compete in the professional circuits and started racing daily, living a life of speed and excitement.
